summary:
"The Lord of the Rings" is a popular fantasy book by J.R.R. Tolkien, written between 1937 and 1949. The story, set in Middle-earth, started as a sequel to his book "The Hobbit" but became much bigger. It follows hobbits like Frodo and Sam on a quest to destroy a powerful ring created by the evil Sauron. Along with friends, they battle Sauron's forces to save Middle-earth.

First published in three parts, it's now often called a trilogy. It's one of the best-selling books worldwide, with over 150 million copies sold. The book has been adapted into successful movies, making it Britain's best-loved novel in a 2003 BBC poll.
title: The Lord of the Rings
